类 AbstractRedisConnection

  • java.lang.Object

    com.buession.core.Destroyable, RedisConnection, Closeable, AutoCloseable

extends Object
implements RedisConnection

      • connect

        public com.buession.lang.Status connect()
                                 throws RedisConnectionFailureException
        从接口复制的说明: RedisConnection
        连接 Redis
        指定者:
        connect 在接口中 RedisConnection
        返回:
        连接成功，则返回 Status.SUCCESS; 否则，返回 Status.FAILURE
        抛出:
        RedisConnectionFailureException - Redis 连接失败异常
